subject: Re: [junit] How to test void methods??
msgSnippet: ... Refer to this FAQ entry: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_4 Mike -- Mike Clark http://clarkware.com (720) 851-2014
messageBody:
Pardeep Duggal wrote:

>Hi,
> Could someone tell me how to test methods that do not return any value. For example, the loadFromDatabase() or similar methods that do not return any value but in turn loads internally a vector or a Hash table with some specific data. and the data it loads is accesible thru the get methods. by calling the get methods and seeing if it does not return me null value is one option, but this does not tell me whether the correct data has been loaded.
>

Refer to this FAQ entry:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_4

Mike
